item.title: Wardrobe
item.description: Some people are uncomfortable with the idea of letting other people to peek inside their closet. But imagine if we made it fun, helpful and purposeful. Imagine yourself feeling great, getting the most out of the clothes hanging in your wardrobe! We provide an in-home service to review your current wardrobe with you, and give you an objective opinion about each item. We help you put together new outfits using your existing wardrobe.
